column4: My flash videos are extremely laggy.  I was told to download the driver for my video card (a VIA s3 unichrome 400 series video card), which I did.  After I ran the decompressed install.sh file and restarted my computer nothing changed.  The framerate on my computer is still 500 fps as opposed to the 2000 that it should be after installing the driver.  Anyone know what I did wrong or how to make flash run smoothly?
BTW, I'm running ubuntu 9.04 on a 5 year old hp pavillion a465w desktop pc
right click on the panel with the clock, and add CPU Level and make sure it's all the way up, helped for me
when I try to add the the cpu frequency scaling monitor to my panel the computer says "error, cpu frequency modification is not supported on this machine"
